comments.text: The line number code in bug 246620 doesn't work with non-HTML documents because the appropriate nodes aren't created by the parser.
comments.raw_text: The line number code in bug 246620 doesn't work with non-HTML documents because the appropriate nodes aren't created by the parser.
comments.author: geoff@thunderbird.net
comments.creator: geoff@thunderbird.net

comments.text: See an example at <http://www.rossde.com/PGP/pgp_keysign_reg.txt>.  Viewing the source of that page has the indentation required for line numbers but no actual numbers.  Thus, the display appears as if the lines are double-spaced.  However, there actually are blank lines between the text lines.
comments.raw_text: See an example at <http://www.rossde.com/PGP/pgp_keysign_reg.txt>.  Viewing the source of that page has the indentation required for line numbers but no actual numbers.  Thus, the display appears as if the lines are double-spaced.  However, there actually are blank lines between the text lines.
comments.creator: david@rossde.com
comments.author: david@rossde.com

comments.creator: deletesoftware+moz@yandex.ru

comments.text: *** Bug 749821 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Using Firefox 26.0a1 nightly, this is not resolved.

HTML - line numbering works.
view-source:http://getbootstrap.com/getting-started/

CSS - line numbering DOES NOT work.
view-source:http://netdna.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.0.0/css/bootstrap.css

JavaScript - line numbering DOES NOT work.
view-source:http://netdna.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/3.0.0/js/bootstrap.js
